abstract: The company continued its retreat from its financial businesses by agreeing to sell the unit to Sumitomo Mitsui Finance and Leasing for about $4.8 billion.
snippet: The company continued its retreat from its financial businesses by agreeing to sell the unit to Sumitomo Mitsui Finance and Leasing for about $4.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — General Electric agreed on Tuesday to sell its commercial lending business in Japan to Sumitomo Mitsui Finance and Leasing, one of Japan’s largest leasing companies, for 575 billion yen, or about $4.8 billion.

headline.main: General Electric to Sell Commercial Lending Business in Japan
